%title /ab/experiments 列出所有的测试

=/ab/experiments 列出所有的测试 =

==ab/experiments ==
返回测试experiments列表

==URL==
/ab/experiments

==支持格式==
JSON XML

==HTTP请求方式==
GET

==请求参数==
无

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -Hacccept:application/xml https://baseurl/experiments
curl -Hacccept:application/json https://baseurl/experiments
  }}}

==返回结果==

# XML Reslut:
{{{ class="brush:xml"
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<experiments>
    <experiment>
        <id>6</id>
        <name>test</name>
        <description>test</description>
        <startDate>2012-10-16 00:00</startDate>
        <endDate>2012-10-16 00:00</endDate>
        <isActive>false</isActive>
        <alternatives>
            <alternative>
                <id>1</id>
                <name>testAlternative</name>
                <description>test alternative description</description>
                <isActive>true</isActive>
                <rules>
                    <rule>
                        <id>1</id>
                        <ruleType>PERCENT</ruleType>
                        <value>30</value>
                    </rule>
                </rules>
            </alternative>
            <alternative>
                <id>2</id>
                <name>testAlternative</name>
                <description>test alternative description</description>
                <isActive>false</isActive>
                <rules/>
            </alternative>
        </alternatives>
    </experiment>
    <experiment>
        <id>7</id>
        <name>test</name>
        <description>test</description>
        <startDate>2012-10-16 00:00</startDate>
        <endDate>2012-10-16 00:00</endDate>
        <isActive>true</isActive>
        <alternatives/>
    </experiment>
</experiments>
  }}}
